name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WizzyBot : AI Replies For Twitter & LinkedIn

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let WizzyBot do the heavy lifting for your social media growth!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WizzyBot accelerates your engagement and growth on social media. Tailored for Twitter and LinkedIn, WizzyBot helps you create smart, personalized comments that drive conversations, boost visibility, and grow your network effortlessly.

Key Features:

- AI-generated comments designed to increase engagement
- Customizable for your unique voice and style
- Perfect for professionals and influencers aiming to expand their reach
- Works seamlessly within Twitter and LinkedIn platforms

Steps To Use WizzyBot: 

- Install the extension
- Enter your OpenAI Key (we do not store your key)
- Begin using WizzyBot to create replies & comments on Twitter and LinkedIn effortlessly!
